Sentencas: All-ceramic solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), which offer advantages in carbon tolerance, sulfur resistance and redox stability, are fabricated and evaluated.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of all-ceramic solid oxide fuel cells based on composite oxide anode

Sentencas: The electrolyte-supported cells are composed of a La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5MnO3-delta (LSCM)-Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95-delta (GDC) anode, an Y2O3-stabilized ZrO2 (YSZ) electrolyte, a GDC interdiffusion barrier layer, and a La0.8Sr0.2Co0.2Fe0.8O3-delta (LSCF)-GDC cathode.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of all-ceramic solid oxide fuel cells based on composite oxide anode

Sentencas: A particle-dispersed glycine-nitrate process is developed to synthesize extremely fine and homogeneous LSCM GDC ceramic composite powders.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of all-ceramic solid oxide fuel cells based on composite oxide anode

Sentencas: The electrochemical performance of the LSCM GDC anode is comparable to that of conventional Ni-based anodes.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of all-ceramic solid oxide fuel cells based on composite oxide anode

Sentencas: The impedance spectra of the all-ceramic SOFCs are successfully interpreted by the independent characterization of the individual electrodes via half-cell Measurements.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of all-ceramic solid oxide fuel cells based on composite oxide anode

Sentencas: The impedance of the LSCM-GDC anode is dominated by a low-frequency arc originating from the chemical capacitance, which is associated with the variation of the oxygen non-stoichiometry in the mixed conducting ceramic electrode.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of all-ceramic solid oxide fuel cells based on composite oxide anode

Sentencas: In addition, the impedance arc associated with the electrode-gas interaction is observed in the LSCM-GDC anode.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of all-ceramic solid oxide fuel cells based on composite oxide anode

Sentencas: The rate-limiting processes for the LSCF-GDC cathode are observed to be solid-state oxygen diffusion and surface chemical exchange.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of all-ceramic solid oxide fuel cells based on composite oxide anode

Sentencas: Herein, the reaction mechanisms and rate-limiting processes of the all-ceramic SOFCs are discussed in detail and compared with those of conventional Ni-based SOFCs.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of all-ceramic solid oxide fuel cells based on composite oxide anode
Fabrication and characterization of all-ceramic solid oxide fuel cells based on composite oxide anode
Fabrication and characterization of all-ceramic solid oxide fuel cells based on composite oxide anode
